full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, , *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB SGO NAS MO 'DRE KHA BSGYUR BZHUGS S+HO, , *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJES GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GI 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA MING BTAGS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS LA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYENG MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA AE SRED SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLON PO SNYING KHAMS CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN,
